DataSecurityLineOfService.description: Describe data security service level requirements.
DataSecurityLineOfService.longDescription: This structure shall be used to describe data security service level requirements.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

AntivirusEngineProvider.longDescription: The value shall specify an AntiVirus provider.

AntivirusScanPolicies.description: Policy for triggering an AntiVirus scan.
AntivirusScanPolicies.longDescription: The enumeration literal shall specify the policy for triggering an AntiVirus scan.

ChannelEncryptionStrength.description: Key size for transport channel encryption.
ChannelEncryptionStrength.longDescription: The enumeration literal shall specify a key size in a symmetric encryption algorithm for transport channel encryption.

DataSanitizationPolicy.longDescription: The enumeration literal shall specify the data sanitization policy.

HostAuthenticationType.description: Authentication type for hosts (servers) or initiator endpoints.
HostAuthenticationType.longDescription: The enumeration literal shall specify the authentication type for hosts (servers) or initiator endpoints.

MediaEncryptionStrength.longDescription: The enumeration literal shall specify a key size in a symmetric encryption algorithm for media encryption.

Oem.description: This is the manufacturer/provider specific extension moniker used to divide the Oem object into sections.
Oem.longDescription: The value of this string shall be of the format for the reserved word *Oem*.

SecureChannelProtocol.longDescription: The enumeration literal shall specify the protocol that provide encrypted communication.

UserAuthenticationType.longDescription: The enumeration literal shall specify the authentication type for users (or programs).

title: #DataSecurityLineOfService.v1_0_1.DataSecurityLineOfService
